original_text: It makes the people unclean if a man marries his brother's wife. He has taken away his brother's honour. They will not have any children.
korean_text: 누구든지 그의 형제의 아내를 데리고 살면 더러운 일이라 그가 그의 형제의 하체를 범함이니 그들에게 자식이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: if a man marries his brother's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 남자가 그의 형제의 아내와 결혼한다면

sentences.original_text: He has taken away his brother's honour
They will not have any children
